mapper.select: SELECT a.sender_id AS senderId, a.user_id AS userId, b.user_name AS senderName, a.order_num AS orderNum, a.order_msg AS orderMsg, a.commission, a.STATUS, a.create_time AS createTime, a.update_time AS updateTime FROM `order` a LEFT JOIN `user` b ON a.sender_id = b.id WHERE a.status= 1

SELECT t1.id, t1.user_id AS userId, t1.sender_id AS senderId, t1.order_num as orderNum, t1.order_msg AS orderMsg, t1.commission, t1.create_time AS createTime, t1.update_time AS updateTime,t1.`status`,t2.user_name AS senderName FROM `order` t1, `user` t2 WHERE t1.sender_id = t2.id and id=#{id}

SELECT t1.id, t1.sender_id AS senderId, t1.user_id AS userId, t2.user_name AS senderName, t1.order_num AS orderNum, t1.order_msg AS orderMsg, t1.commission, t1.`status`, t1.create_time AS createTime, t1.update_time AS updateTime, t3.user_name as cuserName FROM `order` t1 INNER JOIN user t2 on t1.sender_id = t2.id INNER JOIN user t3 on t1.user_id = t3.id where t1.id=#{id}

SELECT IFNULL(a.orderCount,0) as orderCount, IFNULL(b.passCount,0) as passOrderCount, a.createTime from ( SELECT COUNT( * ) AS orderCount, DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS createTime FROM `order` GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) a left JOIN ( SELECT COUNT( * ) AS passCount, DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS createTime FROM `order` WHERE STATUS = 3 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) b ON a.createTime = b.createTime
